webcrawler.algorithm

Class Crawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcrawler.algorithm.Crawler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConferenceCrawler, JournalCrawler

    public abstract class Crawler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the general structure of the crawler.

    • Method Detail

      • getUSER_AGENT

        public java.lang.String getUSER_AGENT()
        Return the USER_AGENT attribute for others classes. It is used to make the web server to think the robot is a normal web browser.

      • search

        public void search(java.lang.String url)
        Initialize the links search.
        Parameters:
        url - Url reference to conference or journal homepage that contains all proceedings or volumes history.

      • searchPapers

        protected abstract void searchPapers()
        Abstract method used to initialize the papers search.
